page.title: 08ECOLOGY
page.content: On our school field there is a heap of dusty soil that was brought here a year ago from filling in holes. We measured it and it took 17 children to go round it and it measured out to be {24m 43cm}in circumference. We found 15 different sorts of flowers and 7 different sorts of grasses. There was 30% grass, 20% buttercup, 15% wildmustard, 10% poppy, 5% thistle, 10% was bare and 10% included the others. The most rare plants are{white {campion and hedgegrow cranesbill.}We took 6 samples of soil from different parts of the heap and found in the dry dusty soil there were very few mini beast except wireworm and red spider mites. In the one sample from the clayey side they were different, {8 earth worm and 6 leatherjackets.}We also found ant, centipedes and spiders.
